comment.author: 71251451@N03
comment._content:
Calle Gran Via.

À direita do autocarro podemos ver um rarissimo, e hoje muito valioso, Citroen Traction Avant Cabriolet.

comment.author: 74784995@N00
comment._content: The film at the Cinema to the side of the English-built? bus is 'El Bandido Calabres' (1950)a.k.a 'Il Brigante Musolino' starring Silvana Mangano and Amadeo Nazzari.
